name: Lanes of Planes
description:
An arcade strategy game made for the TriJam #197 (https://itch.io/jam/trijam-197)

The jam theme: Split up

You manage a fleet of fighter jets (may or may not be made after Tom Cruise's one in Top Gun) and must avoid incoming meteors and defeat enemy planes.

 If you get hit by a meteor or let one of the enemy planes go past you, you lose!

The goal is to survive as long as possible, with a score counter to mark your achievements.

Controls:

Left Click - Select lane, left click again on another lane to move all planes on the selected lane to the new one

Right Click - If you have selected a lane, split the planes to the left and right lanes

I used some free assets, only for the sounds part though.

Credits:

Plane explosion - https://freesound.org/people/derplayer/sounds/587183/

Planes move - https://freesound.org/people/Mellau/sounds/530445/

Planes split - https://freesound.org/people/mrickey13/sounds/515625/

Lane select - https://freesound.org/people/MATRIXXX_/sounds/657946/

Lane deselect - https://freesound.org/people/bernhoftbret/sounds/655157/

Have fun!
